content.question: The passage by al-Khatib is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The continuing endemic presence of malaria in the Mediterranean
The spread of the Black Death in the aftermath of the Mongol conquests
The spread of syphilis in Spain as a result of increased contacts with the Western Hemisphere
The increase in diseases associated with improvements in diet and longevity

content.answer: The spread of the Black Death in the aftermath of the Mongol conquests

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World
